title: Join Us (with Richard Tice MEP)
itunes:title: Join Us (with Richard Tice MEP)
description:
Brexit Party Chairman Richard Tice says the Tories need his party's help at the next election, and insists their candidates are well vetted. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker, that he wants a clean break from the E.U. which the "clowns" in government have not been able to deliver.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Brexit Party Chairman Richard Tice says the Tories need his party's help at the next election, and insists their candidates are well vetted. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker, that he wants a clean break from the E.U. which the "clowns" in government have not been able to deliver.
